name: places/ChIJV3ucG_TzwokRtG9ZOBqOTcE
adrFormatAddress: 5000 Broadway, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
One of my new years resolution for 2023 was to get my drivers license. I got it yesterday. Yay! This driving school schedules the road tests in New Rochelle, the speed limit is faster there (30 mph vs the 10-25 here in Inwood).

I took my first exam in August 2023 with the other driving school in the area. The experience left me unsettled because the instructor there was quick to temper. I do not respond well to being yelled at, especially in confined spaces. It made me realize how important it is to be comfortable and build trust with an instructor.

Luckily I found that with Greg Myers. He's a little kooky, but a good bean. He's got toy cars, a clipboard, and a tape measure. He will measure out how far you are from the curb when parking, and even find the right angle/ cue for your perspective in a car. I am very short, so that helped a lot. He'll help you gain a spatial awareness of a car in motion, and how your actions behind a steering wheel look on the road. He readily gives feedback on what you're doing - wrong or right. It helped me build confidence.

In total I took 13 lessons with him. (I combined some of them for 1 longer 90 min sessions). Sometimes he's a little over zealous with the brake, especially when starting out, but I get it, the instructor brakes are there for a reason and he's not trying to die. Especially useful since I always feel a pinch in my stomach when I have to accelerate backwards when parking on a hill. In his words "I've got you". Thats what I need in a teacher, and Greg delivered.

If you're anything like me, and need someone with patience and grace, give Greg a try.

originalText.text: Greg is an extraordinary teacher! He is very patient, friendly and helpful in many ways. After each driving lesson, told me what I could improve on during my next lesson. I improved tremendously from the very first lesson to the last lesson. With Greg's help, I was able to pass my road test first try. Thank you Greg!!!

originalText.text: My experience at uptown driving school was nothing but a great experience. From the time that I walked in and was welcomed and greeted with the friendly staff. Greg the driving instructor is absolutely amazing !! He‚Äôs knowledgeable and will do everything in his power to make sure you are ready and prepared to pass your road test. He is extremely patient, kind and overall a wonder person. He believed in me and I believed in myself because he taught me well. I passed my test on the first try and it‚Äôs all because of Greg!!!! originalText.text: Learning how to drive with Greg Myers as my instructor was a positive and fruitful experience. Greg is an incredibly patient, proficient, and supportive instructor. Additionally, the staff at Uptown Driving School are kind and very accommodating of any schedule. Overall, this is a great school!

Additionally, the staff at Uptown Driving School are kind and very accommodating of any schedule. Overall, this is a great school!

originalText.text:
Best decision I've ever made! The most friendly receptionist got me all sorted out with no pressure. I took 6 classes with Greg and from day one he had me actually Driving. He has full control of the car too so if he sees your steering is off, he'll help guide you. He was very patient and helped me build confidence each step of the way. At class #6, I was driving smoothly and actually passed my DMV Test the first time.

Now that I have my license I'm definitely taking his next course on driving though Highways! Thanks again team! üôè
